title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 101 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 101 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O LORD, will I sing.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗）我要歌唱慈爱和公平。耶和华阿，我要向你歌颂。

lineList.en: I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
lineList.cn: 我要用智慧行完全的道。你几时到我这里来呢。我要存完全的心，行在我家中。

lineList.en: I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me.
lineList.cn: 邪僻的事，我都不摆在我眼前。悖逆人所做的事，我甚恨恶，不容沾在我身上。

lineList.en: A froward heart shall depart from me: I will not know a wicked person.
lineList.cn: 弯曲的心思，我必远离。一切的恶人（或译恶事），我不认识。

lineList.en: Whoso privily slandereth his neighbour, him will I cut off: him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer.
lineList.cn: 在暗中谗谤他邻居的，我必将他灭绝。眼目高傲，心里骄纵的，我必不容他。

lineList.en: Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me.
lineList.cn: 我眼要看国中的诚实人，叫他们与我同住。行为完全的，他要伺候我。

lineList.en: He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight.
lineList.cn: 行诡诈的，必不得住在我家里。说谎话的，必不得立在我眼前。

lineList.en: I will early destroy all the wicked of the land; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我每日早晨，要灭绝国中所有的恶人。好把一切作孽的，从耶和华的城里剪除。
